prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Louise Imogen Guiney Collection, Accession # 7088-e, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains one letter, ALS, dated 1886 Feb 11, from Louise I[mogen]Guiney to Anna Bensel, concerning a clipping from "Boyle O'Reilly's paper" [ The Boston Pilot], K. E. Conway, Clinton Scollard, Anna's brother.
